website_summaries.verdict: The Creative Aurvana Trio earphones deliver a solid wired listening experience, though we'd prefer a little more high-mid presence.
pros: Strong audio performance with a focus on mids and lows
cons: Less crisp than some listeners will prefer

customer_reviews.title: Issues with sound breaking up when move around (shame as sound and comfort/fit was great)
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these headphones, I have small ears and the ear buds sizes provided, included a small size that fit my ears perfectly, (which was not the case when I bought Sony ones where I had to order a seperate pack of earbud tips to get correct size for my ears). As well as these earphones fitting perfectly, they were very comfortable and sounded great. The problem came when I moved around with them, the sound would break up. I think it was something to do with the mmcx cable provided (not the earbuds themselves) Ultimately I decided to return them, if these were £30 headphones I would have put up with it, but not at £109.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New lead required for optimum sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones but given the requirement to replace the lead with better quality to ensure reliability and sound you might fare better spending some more on other balanced armature products.
customer_reviews.author: azureus49

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality !!!
customer_reviews.text: Frequency range is phenomenal I recommend use it with good quality audio 320Kbps or better.So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chalupa

customer_reviews.title: These are great sounding earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding earbuds. They are balanced and highs muds an bass are rich and clear.Bass heads will not be pleased, even though there is plenty of bass response. However, the bass response is natural and based on the producer's input not artificial enhancement by the earbuds resulting in clear appropriate bass response.low to no sibilance.
customer_reviews.author: Larbos

customer_reviews.title: Sound incredible!  Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is incredible, fabulous. It looks like they spen their budget on the headphones not the cable (which is not good). But the cable is replaceable! Genius. Cables are cheap! And the headphones sound the best for earbuds I have ever heard. Update: still the greatest, you will never regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: DPC

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Cable
customer_reviews.text: The cable is very poor quality and doesn't maintain its braid. It also has problems with intermittent sound after only a couple months of using it on the bus. The poor quality cable isn't covered by the warranty...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: If sound is your priority.....
customer_reviews.text: These may appear pricey for wired earbuds, but carrying around an over the ear bluetooth headphones and worrying about battery life can get tiresome, so I've decided to get some brand name compact earbuds as an alternative. Glad I stumbled upon these, great sound and fit well. Been using them a few hours each day for the past week. The small case is a nice touch to protect my new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Audio CONSTANTLY skips and cuts out
customer_reviews.text: Sad that they ruined otherwise good earphones by making detachable buds. I imagine it's this design choice that causes the audio to heavily skip/distort at least 2x per minute.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is a suprise
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a earbuds just for daily use but the sound quality was a real surprise. I didn't expected a small headphones to have such good sound like a big over the ear headphones. And it come with a little pouch that let me put it away after use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fung

customer_reviews.title: 5* Sound Quality!
customer_reviews.text: After read the mix reviews, I decided to give it a try. Now I in love, sound quality was exceptionally well, felt like I'm in a live concert. Amazed how little ear buds could create.
customer_reviews.author: susan chang

customer_reviews.title: great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: good quality great sound for the price. Stick out of ear bit more that other ear buds have had in the past. would buy again for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: The only advantage is the excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. Bad non-slip wire.No pins on the collar. VERY BAD noise insulation. Small case for large earplugs. My ears hurt. Аnd great sound.The sound is really good (all range). Compare with the etymotic ep-4s.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Orlov

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t stand painfully loud beeps. Sound quality is fine.
customer_reviews.text: Treble was underwhelming at first as if sampling rate was too low. Maybe it’s just tuned that way. There’s a noticeable hiss in the background, so the amp doesn’t feel high quality which is unexpected from Creative Labs. Over few hours I got used the the sound profile. However I couldn’t stand the loud beeps that occur when you hit limit upon reducing volume. Couldn’t find a way to turn it off on the SXFI app. Thus returning.
customer_reviews.author: ayush3504

customer_reviews.title: The best under $200.
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that the reviews for the wired model and wireless model are clumped together. Good Luck telling which review is for what. Mine is for the wired model. The best under $200 that I’ve used Great accurate sound. Comfortable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LKE

customer_reviews.title: Sound is unbeleivable if you invest in custom molded earpieces!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when my Shure E-500s blew out and was told they couldn't be fixed. While I was impressed with them out of the box, I tried an experiment. I had invested in custom molded earpieces from Pilot Stuff for my E-500s. Using an Exacto knife, I enlarged the holes so I could insert the Aurvanas. Man, am I glad I did! With the custom molded earpiece, the Aurvanas catapulted to the best sounding listening device I have ever known, and that includes the E-500s and top of the line Sony over the ears that I purchased 20 years ago for an absolutely ridiculous price. My quest for over the top audiophile sound has finally ended!
customer_reviews.author: JMJH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Snagged these for $80 on Creative's website. Pros: Incredible value; I've paid $300+ for 'phones that don't sound this good Smooth and well-controlled sound with a slight V-shape No sibilance! Con: Cable isn't great (but it's detachable) I can see how some people might not get a good seal Comparisons to other IEMs: Trio has tighter bass, much better clarity than the Shure 215, or VSonic GR07 or GR07 Bass, Westone Pro 10 Trio has smaller soundstage, but better clarity, than the Shure 535
customer_reviews.author: scpd

customer_reviews.title: faulty earphone: the left doesn't have bass at all
customer_reviews.text: i received the earphone last month as a gift. Just unboxed and started using it today with a lot excitement. Turns out straight out of the box, the left is much lower and hollower than the other, and the left earphone has no bass at all. I think the "Dynamic Woofer" is faulty or missing on the left. Wonder how creative did the quality control. Had a lot expectation on the earphone, and turned out so disappointed. ===================== update on May 11th After having reached to creative support, for the faulty earpiece out of box, still didn't receive any response after a week.
customer_reviews.author: JL

product_meta.title: CREATIVE Aurvana Trio Audiophile In-Ear Headphones with Hybrid Triple Drivers and Detachable MMCX Braided Cable (Dark Grey)
feature_bullets: HYBRID TRIPLE-DRIVER SYSTEM | Amazing clarity and detail across the entire audio spectrum with dedicated drivers for highs, mids and lows
AURASEAL DESIGN | Up to 98% noise isolation while you focus on your work
ANGLED IN-EAR DESIGN | Snug non-slip fit for non-disruptive and long-wearing comfort
INLINE MIC WITH CONTROL | High-quality in-call voice pick-up with easy access playback control
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
